delete.summary: Delete all information stored for a user account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user account.

get.summary: Export all information stored about a user account.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the user account.

email.description: The email address of the user.

devices.description: The devices which belong to the user's account.

custom_id.description: The custom id in the user's account.

verify_time.description: The UNIX time when the user's email was verified.

apiAccount.description: A user with additional account details. Always the current user.

id.description: A device identifier. Should be obtained by a platform-specific device API.

apiAccountDevice.description: Send a device to the server. Used with authenticate/link/unlink and user.

channel_id.description: The channel this message belongs to.

message_id.description: The unique ID of this message.

code.description: The code representing a message type or category.

sender_id.description: Message sender, usually a user ID.

username.description: The username of the message sender, if any.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the message was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the message was last updated.

persistent.description: True if the message was persisted to the channel's history, false otherwise.

apiChannelMessage.description: A message sent on a channel.

creator_id.description: The id of the user who created the group.

name.description: The unique name of the group.

lang_tag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

avatar_url.description: A URL for an avatar image.

open.description: Anyone can join open groups, otherwise only admins can accept members.

edge_count.description: The current count of all members in the group.

max_count.description: The maximum number of members allowed.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the group was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the group was last updated.

leaderboard_id.description: The ID of the leaderboard this score belongs to.

owner_id.description: The ID of the score owner, usually a user or group.

username.description: The username of the score owner, if the owner is a user.

num_score.description: The number of submissions to this score record.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record was updated.

expiry_time.description: The UNIX time when the leaderboard record expires.

apiLeaderboardRecord.description: Represents a complete leaderboard record with all scores and associated metadata.

content.description: Content of the notification in JSON.

sender_id.description: ID of the sender, if a user. Otherwise 'null'.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the notification was created.

persistent.description: True if this notification was persisted to the database.

collection.description: The collection which stores the object.

key.description: The key of the object within the collection.

user_id.description: The user owner of the object.

version.description: The version hash of the object.

permission_read.description: The read access permissions for the object.

permission_write.description: The write access permissions for the object.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the object was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the object was last updated.

apiStorageObject.description: An object within the storage engine.

id.description: The id of the user's account.

username.description: The username of the user's account.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

avatar_url.description: A URL for an avatar image.

lang_tag.description: The language expected to be a tag which follows the BCP-47 spec.

location.description: The location set by the user.

timezone.description: The timezone set by the user.

metadata.description: Additional information stored as a JSON object.

facebook_id.description: The Facebook id in the user's account.

google_id.description: The Google id in the user's account.

gamecenter_id.description: The Apple Game Center in of the user's account.

steam_id.description: The Steam id in the user's account.

online.description: Indicates whether the user is currently online.

edge_count.description: Number of related edges to this user.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the user was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the user was last updated.

consoleAccountExport.description:
*
An export of all information stored for a user account.

consoleAuthenticateRequest.description:
*
Authenticate against the server with username+password.

id.description: The unique ID of the change.

user_id.description: The user ID this change belongs to.

create_time.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was created.

update_time.description: The UNIX time when the wallet ledger item was updated.

consoleWalletLedger.description:
*
A wallet ledger item representing a change to the user's wallet.

nakamaconsoleSession.description:
*
A user's session used to authenticate messages.

protobufEmpty.title:
A generic empty message that you can re-use to avoid defining duplicated
empty messages in your APIs. A typical example is to use it as the request
or the response type of an API method. For instance:
